title: EventEnvelope
description: Common envelope for all events; transport-agnostic. See catalog.md for per-event fields.

aggregate_type.description: Which aggregate this event primarily concerns

aggregate_id.description: Stable identifier of the aggregate in its source system

actor.description: Originator of the event (e.g., system, admin:user_42)

version.description: Event definition version; increment for backward-compatible additions

idempotency_key.description: Stable key to detect duplicate deliveries of the same logical event
